CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 7, 1956, pg. C3, reads: "'A Child's Dream' - A child's dream of the night before Christmas was the theme of the pageant - party given by the Hayes School of Music pupils last week. Pictured here are James Wright, Bessie Wilkes, Edith Buntin, Eroline Banks, Janet Plater, Cynthia McClelland, Beverly English, Jo-Ann Cobb, Annabyrd Campbell, Judith Dickson, Marlene Cain, Toni Brown, Ernestine Wrigth [Wright?] and Edgar Strothers.  Pamela Stevens had the leading part. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fifteen children including James Wright, Bessie Wilkes, Edith Buntin, Eroline Banks, Janet Plater, Cynthia McClelland, Beverly English, Jo-Ann Cobb, Annabyrd Campbell, Judith Dickson, Marlene Cain, Toni Brown, Ernestine Wright, Edgar Strothers, and Pamela Stevens, posed for "A Child's Dream" pageant in Hayes School of Music with Christmas tree, 6490 Frankstown Avenue, East Liberty, another version
